room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Had another fun time with the kids, we were joined by another couple, had a blast. Had surprises that made the girls scream, will recommend to others.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: My first experience with an escape room and it was a great time. They have a wide selection of rooms and we their island scenario. Our Game Master was Lizzy and she did an excellent job on hints and technical help that did just enough to keep us moving while still letting us control the pace.The phrase escape room can be a bit misleading as the event we did was a series of a puzzles not directly related to an escape. Still required thinking and teamwork, just be clear what you looking for.We had a lot of fun. If I was in Minneapolis for more than two days I'd definitely go through all of their rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Won with much less than a second left on Island Escape, thanks for the good time!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Great birthday activity!! My husband and I joined a team who also were celebrating a birthday. Great staff and had a great time! The Island escape comes to show strangers are able to work together and escape!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: My family played "Kidnapped" and we almost broke out in time. We liked it so much that we booked another room and went today for the "Island Escape"! We made it with a minute and a half to spare! The staff is great and a nice entertainment factor. Will definitely book again!
